The photo was published on Facebook on O: 2020, along with a caption describing the incident in Rajasthan's Tonk district.
Tonk Police spokesperson confirmed on Tw: 3. A reverse image search on Google revealed that the same photo was shared on Twitter with a claim related to an incident in a town in central India.
Local Hindi language newspapers Navbhara: not Rajasthan, on September 29, 2020. The police report and statements from the investigating officer supported this information.
